<script>
  window.sp_track = function() { };
</script>

  var _gaq = _gaq || [];
  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),

  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  var metas, experimentId, variation;
  metas = document.querySelectorAll('head meta');
  
  for (var i = 0; i < metas.length; i++) {
    if (metas[i] && metas[i].name === 'website-experiment-experiment-id') {
      experimentId = metas[i].content;
    }
    if (metas[i] && metas[i].name === 'website-experiment-variation-id') {
      variation = metas[i].content;
    }
  }
  
  if ((typeof experimentId).toLowerCase() === 'string' && (typeof variation).toLowerCase() === 'string') {
    ga('set', 'expId', experimentId);
    ga('set', 'expVar', variation);
  }
  
  ga('require', 'ec'); // for ad tracking
  ga('set', 'dimension1', 'bibme desktop homepage');
  ga('set', 'dimension2', "not logged in");
  ga('set', 'dimension3', "not logged in");

  ga('send', 'pageview');

            }
          </script>
        <div id="google_ads_iframe_/20770788/BM_728x90_ATF_Homepage_0__container__" style="border: 0pt none;"><iframe id="google_ads_iframe_/20770788/BM_728x90_ATF_Homepage_0" title="3rd party ad content" name="google_ads_iframe_/20770788/BM_728x90_ATF_Homepage_0" width="970" height="250" scrolling="no" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="0" src="javascript:&quot;<html><body style='background:transparent'></body></html>&quot;" style="border: 0px; vertical-align: bottom;"></iframe></div><iframe id="google_ads_iframe_/20770788/BM_728x90_ATF_Homepage_0__hidden__" title="" name="google_ads_iframe_/20770788/BM_728x90_ATF_Homepage_0__hidden__" width="0" height="0" scrolling="no" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="0" src="javascript:&quot;<html><body style='background:transparent'></body></html>&quot;" style="border: 0px; vertical-align: bottom; visibility: hidden; display: none;"></iframe></div>
<div class="premium">Ads keep us free. <a href="/users/register?from=ad">Upgrade</a> to remove.</div>        <script type="text/javascript">
            if (window.cra) {
                document.write("<div class='pubnation' data-target='a-desktop-lboard-1'>Report this ad.</div>");
            }
        </script><div class="pubnation" data-target="a-desktop-lboard-1">Report this ad.</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row" id="header">
<div class="col-md-10 col-xs-6">
<a href="/" id="banner">
<div id="logo"></div>
</a>
<nav class="hidden-xs hidden-sm" id="standard-navigation">
<h1>
Automatic Bibliography Maker
</h1>
<h2>
Build a bibliography or works cited page the easy way
</h2>
<ul class="top-nav">
<li>
<a href="/bibliographies">My Bibliographies</a>
</li>
<li>
<a onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'menu','clicked', 'plagiarism']);" href="/plagiarism-check">Plagiarism Checker</a>
</li>
<li><a href="/citation-guide">Citation Guide</a></li>
<li><a href="/title-page/new">Title Page</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://support.bibme.org">Support</a></li>
</ul>
</nav>
</div>
<div class="col-md-2 hidden-xs pull-right" id="login">
<a href="/login">Log In</a>
&nbsp; | &nbsp;
<a href="/users/register">Register</a>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-6 visible-xs pull-right" id="mobile-menu">
<button class="collapsed" data-target=".bs-navbar-collapse" data-toggle="collapse" id="mobile-menu-button" type="button"></button>
<span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-bars"></span>
</div>
<nav class="col-xs-12 navbar-collapse bs-navbar-collapse collapse" id="mobile-navigation">
<ul class="nav navbar-nav">
<li class="hidden-sm"><a href="/login">Log In</a></li>
<li class="hidden-sm"><a href="/users/register">Register</a></li>

</ul>
</nav>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-9 col-xs-12" id="content">
<div class="row">
<div class="aligned-box" id="create-citations">
<h1>
Start creating citations easily.
<br>
<small></small>
</h1>
<div class="row col-md-12">
<ul class="action-button-set">
<li class="action-button-shell">
<a href="/apa">
<div class="action-button" id="apa">APA</div>
</a>
</li>
<li class="action-button-shell">
<a href="/mla">
<div class="action-button" id="mla">MLA</div>
</a>
</li>
<li class="action-button-shell">
<a href="/chicago">
<div class="action-button" id="chicago">Chicago/Turabian</div>
</a>
</li>
<li class="action-button-shell" id="other-style-search">
<div class="action-button" id="other-style-search-button">
<i class="fa fa-search visible-xs"></i>
<span class="hidden-xs">More +</span>
</div>
</li>
</ul>
<div id="other-style-search-box">
<input id="style-search-bar" placeholder="Search for a specific style" type="text">
<a href="#" id="close-other-style-search" style="display:none;">
<i class="fa fa-close fa-large"></i>
</a>
<div id="style-search-results">
<div id="interactive-styles">
<ul id="search-styles"></ul>
<ul id="all-styles"></ul>
</div>
<div id="popular-styles">
<h5>Popular Styles</h5>
<ul>
<a href="/mla"><li id="mla7">MLA</li>
</a><a href="/apa"><li id="apa">APA</li>
</a><a href="/chicago"><li id="chicagob">Chicago/Turabian</li>
</a></ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-12 aligned-box">
<div class="row" id="welcome-to-bibme">
<div class="col-md-12">
<div style="text-align:center;"></div>
<h3>Welcome to BibMe</h3>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-9">
<p>The fully automatic bibliography maker that auto-fills. Its the easiest way to generate citations to build a works cited page. And its free.</p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-3">
&nbsp;
</div>
</div>
<div class="row steps">
<div class="step col-md-4 col-xs-12">
<div class="step-image-large col-xs-4 col-md-12 icon-magnifying-glass-on-blue-circle icon-magnifying-glass-on-blue-circle-dims">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-blue col-md-12 hidden-xs hidden-sm"></div>
<div class="step-label col-xs-8 col-md-12">
<span class="number">1</span>
<h4 class="hidden-xs hidden-sm">
Select style<br>&amp; search
</h4>
<span class="visible-xs visible-sm">Select style &amp; search</span>
</div>
<p class="step-details col-md-12 col-xs-8">
Search for a book, article, website, film, or enter the information yourself.
</p>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-blue col-xs-12 visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
</div>
<div class="step col-md-4 col-xs-12">
<div class="step-image-large col-xs-4 col-md-12 icon-plus-sign-on-blue-circle icon-plus-sign-on-blue-circle-dims">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-blue col-md-12 hidden-xs hidden-sm"></div>
<div class="step-label col-xs-8 col-md-12">
<span class="number">2</span>
<h4 class="hidden-xs hidden-sm">Add it easily and continue</h4>
<span class="visible-xs visible-sm">Add it easily and continue</span>
</div>
<p class="step-details col-md-12 col-xs-8">
Add it to your bibliography and continue citing to build your works cited list.
</p>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-blue col-xs-12 visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
</div>
<div class="step col-md-4 col-xs-12">
<div class="step-image-large col-xs-4 col-md-12 icon-download-on-blue-circle icon-download-on-blue-circle-dims">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-blue col-md-12 hidden-xs hidden-sm"></div>
<div class="step-label col-xs-8 col-md-12">
<span class="number">3</span>
<h4 class="hidden-xs hidden-sm">Download bibliography</h4>
<span class="visible-xs visible-sm">Download bibliography</span>
</div>
<p class="step-details col-md-12 col-xs-8">
Download your bibliography in either the APA, MLA, Chicago or Turabian formats. Its that easy!
</p>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-blue col-xs-12 visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row" id="why-cite">
<div class="col-md-12">
<h3>Why Should I Cite?</h3>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-9 col-xs-12">
<p>Using other peoples research or ideas without giving them due credit is plagiarism. Since BibMe makes it easy to create citations, build bibliographies and acknowledge other peoples work, there is no excuse to plagiarize. Dont be a thiefsave your grade, use BibMe and give credit to those who deserve it!</p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-3 hidden-xs hidden-sm">
&nbsp;
</div>
</div>
<div class="row steps">
<div class="step col-md-4 col-xs-12">
<div class="step-image-medium col-xs-4 col-md-12 icon-medal-and-ribbon-on-orange-circle icon-medal-and-ribbon-on-orange-circle-dims">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-orange col-md-12 hidden-xs hidden-sm"></div>
<div class="step-label col-xs-8 col-md-12">
<h4>It is ethical to give authors and artists credit for their work.</h4>
</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-orange col-xs-12 visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
</div>
<div class="step col-md-4 col-xs-12">
<div class="step-image-medium col-xs-4 col-md-12 icon-check-mark-on-orange-circle icon-check-mark-on-orange-circle-dims">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-orange col-md-12 hidden-xs hidden-sm"></div>
<div class="step-label col-xs-8 col-md-12">
<h4>By establishing provenance you strengthen your own work.</h4>
</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-orange col-xs-12 visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
</div>
<div class="step col-md-4 col-xs-12">
<div class="step-image-medium col-xs-4 col-md-12 icon-heart-on-orange-circle icon-heart-on-orange-circle-dims">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-orange col-md-12 hidden-xs hidden-sm"></div>
<div class="step-label col-xs-8 col-md-12">
<h4>It helps an interested reader delve deeper. Its good karma!</h4>
</div>
<div class="step-separator step-separator-orange col-xs-12 visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="aligned-box col-md-12">
<div id="helpful-tips">
<h3>Helpful Tips for Your Citation</h3>
<div>
<div class="icons-help">
&nbsp;
</div>
<div class="content">
<div class="our">
<a href="/citation-guide">Our citation guides</a> provide detailed information about all types of sources in MLA, APA, Chicago and Turabian styles.
</div>
<div class="req">
If required by your instructor, you can add annotations to your citations. Just click Add Annotation above.
</div>
<div class="eval">
Remember to evaluate your sources for accuracy and credibility. Questionable sources could result in a poor grade!
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="col-md-3 col-xs-12" id="sidebar-right">

a.apply(b,arguments)}},p=function(a,b,c){p=Function.prototype.bind&amp;&amp;-1!=Function.prototype.bind.toString().indexOf(&quot;native code&quot;)?ba:ca;return p.apply(null,arguments)},da=Date.now||function(){return+new Date};var ea=String.prototype.trim?function(a){return a.trim()}:function(a){return a.replace(/^[\s\xa0]+|[\s\xa0]+$/g,&quot;&quot;)},q=function(a,b){return-1!=a.indexOf(b)},r=function(a,b){return a&lt;b?-1:a&gt;b?1:0};var <!-- END SBM Embedded Partial -->
<script>
  window.i18n = (window.i18n || {});
  window.i18n.locale = "en";
  
  $(document).ready(function() {
    var options = {
        namespaceSplitter: '.'
    };
  
    window.i18n.t = libTranslate.getTranslationFunction(window.i18n.translations[window.i18n.locale], options);
  });
</script>

</style><iframe frameborder="false" style="display: none; position: fixed; top: 0px; left: 0px; z-index: 2147483647;"></iframe><iframe src="http://us-u.openx.net/w/1.0/pd?plm=5&amp;ph=ca907f40-78db-4717-b59a-8b8b0cce9d12" width="0" height="0" style="display:none;"></iframe><iframe id="google_osd_static_frame_4832674753852" name="google_osd_static_frame" style="display: none; width: 0px; height: 0px;"></iframe></body></html>
